meaningMnemonic: Let's take a look at this <kanji>example</kanji> and <kanji>surround</kanji> it. This example shows the <vocabulary>extent</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>scope</vocabulary> of what we're doing, and the line that surrounds it shows how far that scope goes.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
